description: Write a function that checks if an IPv4 `ip_str` falls within any `loopback_ranges`. `loopback_ranges` is a NULL-terminated array of CIDR strings. Example (Blocked): is_ip_in_ranges("127.0.0.1", ["127.0.0.0/8", NULL]) -> 1. Example (Public): is_ip_in_ranges("8.8.8.8", ["127.0.0.0/8", NULL]) -> 0.
